title: Gold+ team. Looking for teams with a space, willing to offer a spot for season rewards
body: So I havent had the chance for enough committment to this years ranked season sadly with life going on. If some gold+ team would invite me or even want me to play with them (i've been as far as gold V last pre-season) i'd like to get the season rewards. If you're the kind darl im looking for, Im Razlosli on OCE. Please, i'll love you long time{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
